name: RotateMe
description:
Do you love spinning. Do you like to rotate..

Yes.....

Then  this game is for you. take the adventure of 3 player , A ball, A  Box, A particle and collect as star by spinning  in an rotator ride and become the SuperStar.

Controls :

  • Left key for anti Clock Wise
  • Right Key for CLockWise

 Happy Gaming..!!!!
